Completeness of company profile and job details. Company with incomplete profile or poor job description will not be featured. Business Development Manager at Audience.to 
Audience.to lets people create and send personal messages based on what users do on your website and mobile app.
Work location: Makati City, Philippines / Full-time Requirement: Experience in CRM/ERP/Cloud based or SaaS solution sales, successful track record in of identifying and converting B2B Sales opportunities. Skills: Digital marketing, SaaS. Salary Range: PHP 50,000 – 100,000 Equity: Yes More jobs at Audience.to 
Bussiness Development at Phinemo Kreasi Media 
Phinemo Kreasi Media runs Phinemo.com as online travel media in Indonesia. Create original creative, informative & entertaining content for the travel enthusiast.
Work location: Jakarta, Indonesia / Full-time Requirement: Understand how to network and work with a client, passion with digital media & travel industry, having at least 2-4 years experience in digital advertising agency. Skills: Business development & partnerships, sales, time management. Salary Range: IDR 6,000,000 – 10,000,000 More jobs at Phinemo Kreasi Media 
Sales Intern at Pear Comms Pte Ltd 
As Pear Comms’s flagship product ,QuickDesk is a cloud-based CRM sales engagement tool which helps sales professionals better track leads and sales activities for sales productivity.
Work location: Singapore / Internship Requirement: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, highly self-motivated and self-driven with the ability to learn fast and think on feet. Skills: Sales strategy & management, CRM, sales & marketing. Salary Range: SGD 600 – 750 More jobs at Pear Comms Pte Ltd 
Business Manager Singapore at Bridestory 
Bridestory is an inspiring and resourceful online global wedding directory and marketplace that helps to connect wedding professionals and vendors with engaged couples around the world.
Work location: Singapore / Full-time Requirement: Great verbal and written communication skills Confident, assertive self-starter who is extremely organized and goal driven, ability to learn and think quickly. Skills: Sales, business development. Salary Range: SGD 2,000 – 3,000 More jobs at Bridestory 
Accounts Manager at Magic Sewa 
Magic Sewa is taxi service that offers secure, reliable and responsible service in Delhi.
Work location: New Delhi, India / Full-time Requirement: Ability to establish and maintain robust tracking and reporting mechanism to support decision-making. Skills: Account management. Salary Range: INR 25,000 – 33,000 More jobs at Magic Sewa 
Digital Merchandiser at Blaire Labs 
Blaire Labs is fast-growing startup focusing on the digitization of retail businesses in Indonesia and Singapore.
Work location: Jakarta, Indonesia / Full-time Requirement: Highly analytical with a passion for Excel and data, fluent in English, able to work under tight timelines and in a high pressure, fast-paced environment. Skills: Business development & partnerships, merchandising, e-commerce. Salary Range: IDR 10,000,000 – 15,000,000 More jobs at Blaire Labs 
Business Development Intern at Easyship 
Easyship is the one-stop solution for all e-commerce sellers fulfillment needs with our algorithm and smart in-house logistics solution all on demand.
Work location: Hong Kong / Internship Requirement: Business or related studies, great organizational skills with big attention to detail, excellent communication skills. Skills: Business development, sales, growth hacking. Salary Range: HKD 1,500 – 3,000 More jobs at Easyship 
Business Development Executive at ENK Ventures Sdn Bhd 
ENK Ventures is known as Real Estate Entrepreneur & Negotiator from East Malaysia.
Work location: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia / Full-time Requirement: Love meeting people, good interpersonal, presentation and communication skills, with a passion for the property industry. Skills: Business development, English language, Microsoft Office. More jobs at ENK Ventures Sdn Bhd 
Management Trainee (Sales and Marketing) at LaunchPad Startup 
LaunchPad is a venture builder headquartered in Malaysia which identifies and maximizes tech-related opportunities across South-East Asia.
Work location: Damansara, Malaysia / Full-time Requirement: An energetic, hungry and passionate individual with the willingness to learn, extroverted and comfortable talking to strangers. Skills: Sales strategy & management, communication skills. Salary Range: MYR 2,500 – 3,500 More jobs at LaunchPad Startup 
Publisher Sales Manager at Valuepotion 
Valuepotion is a mobile-app lifetime value (LTV) maximization platform specialized in app analytics and marketing.
Work location: Hanoi, Vietnam / Full-time Requirement: 3 years+ of professional experience of publisher sales in ad tech company or agencies, strong verbal and written communication skill both in Vietnamese and English. Skills: Business development & partnerships, sales, mobile advertising. Salary Range: USD 1,000 – 1,500 More jobs at Valuepotion
